whatsNext.title: 🙏 Prayer
whatsNext.content: Talk to God daily. Be real. He’s listening—always.

whatsNext.title: 🌊 Water Baptism
whatsNext.content: Go public with your faith. It shows the world what Jesus did for you.

whatsNext.title: 🔥 Holy Ghost Baptism
whatsNext.content: Ask God to fill you with His power and presence.

whatsNext.title: 📖 God’s Word
whatsNext.content: Feed your faith daily through Scripture. Start with the Gospels.
whatsNext.verse: “Man shall not live by bread alone...”

whatsNext.title: 🌱 Grow in Community
whatsNext.content: We grow stronger together. Find fellowship, not isolation.

whatsNext.title: ❤️ Love God First
whatsNext.content: Put Jesus above everything. Love leads to real transformation.

whatsNext.title: ✨ Personal Revelation
whatsNext.content: Don’t just know about Jesus—get to know Him for yourself.
